author: cbs8
title: Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 Offers Convenient Lodging for Wofford vs. Western Carolina Football Game
text:
Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers convenient lodging for the Wofford College vs. Western Carolina football game on October 17, 2015.
 SPARTANBURG, SC, October 16, The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers convenient lodging for the Wofford College and Western Carolina football game. Wofford will host its Southern Conference rival on October 17. Kickoff time will be 2pm at Gibbs Stadium. Game tickets are $25 for adults.
"We are pleased to provide award winning accommodations to fans attending the Wofford and Western Carolina game," comments Dawn Allison, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. "We are conveniently located just minutes away from downtown Spartanburg and the Wofford campus," explains Ms. Allison.
A leading choice among hotels in Spartanburg , the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award for outstanding service. This non-smoking property features well appointed guest rooms with microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Travelers will rest comfortably on Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . Guests can enjoy a freshly baked cookie at check in, and then relax and unwind at the fitness center or seasonal outdoor pool. Work details are easy to take care of in Hampton Inn's 24-hour business center. The complimentary On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is a delicious way to start the day. Convenient On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick alternative on weekday mornings. Nearby Upstate attractions include Chapman Cultural Center, BMW Zentrum, and the Premium Outlets at Gaffney.
Current lodging specials at this Spartanburg South Carolina hotel include the Weekend Getaway Package with late check out and the 2X Points Package for Hilton Honors members. AAA, senior, and military rates are available. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 is located at Exit 78.
For information and tickets to the Wofford College and Western Carolina football game, visit www.wofford.edu . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn North I-85 Spartanburg SC hotel , call (864) 577-9080 or visit online at www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com .
About Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
This Spartanburg Hotel invites guests to step back in time to the colonial era or indulge in modern luxuries and recreation in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg Hotel on North I-85 is situated to offer easy access of the Duncan business centers and is within five minutes of Wofford College. Guests can take a short drive into Greenville to see historic landmarks or enjoy world-class entertainment. This Spartanburg hotel offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
 visit http://www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com
